entries.meaning: A case for displaying merchandise or valuable items.
A setting, occasion, or medium for exhibiting something or someone, especially in an attractive or favorable aspect.

verbs.description: showcase (third-person singular simple present showcases, present participle showcasing, simple past and past participle showcased)

entries.meaning: To display, demonstrate, show, or present.
examples: I think the demonstration really showcases the strengths of the software.
